label: Open the magic book
prompt_text: open the magic cookbook and reveal glowing pages

label: Stir in rainbow
prompt_text: stir in a bright rainbow glow

prompt_text: add shimmering sparkles and glitter dust

label: Sprinkle tiny stars
prompt_text: sprinkle tiny twinkling stars

label: Pour a potion
prompt_text: pour a colorful potion with friendly bubbles

prompt_text: whisk pancake batter with magical swirls

prompt_text: flip pancakes in a fun cartoon style (no mess)

prompt_text: add a syrup swirl that looks like a golden spiral

label: Add whipped cloud
prompt_text: add a whipped-cream cloud puff

label: Make it neon
prompt_text: turn on a neon outline glow around everything

label: Make it puffy

label: Add star confetti
prompt_text: add star-shaped confetti drifting gently

prompt_text: add glitter gel-pen accents and doodles

prompt_text: place a cute bow on top as a finishing touch

prompt_text: summon fluffy clouds and a dreamy sky background

label: Zoom to outer space
prompt_text: transition into cute outer space with planets and stars

label: Add planet rings

label: Spooky-cute night glow

label: Add friendly ghost sticker
prompt_text: add a tiny friendly ghost sticker (cute, smiling, not scary)

label: Seal with a magic stamp
prompt_text: seal the recipe with a cute magic stamp and sparkles

label: Frame it like a card
prompt_text: frame the final art like a collectible recipe card

label: Final glitter blast
prompt_text: finish with a gentle glitter burst and soft glow
